info.title: Super Pixel Jumper
info.author: ThatOtherPerson
info.details:
Super Pixel Jumper is a score based platformer with constant forward motion. As long as you avoid contact with the brighter coloured blocks your score will continue to increase as will the speed of the game. Your high score is automatically saved.

This game has an online leaderboard.

Controls:
D Pad = Move
2 Button = Jump
+ Button = Restart the music
- Button = Restart the music

Author:
ThatOtherPerson (thatotherperson@yahoo.com)
ThatOtherDev.com

Background music (fight for your life loop) by Xythe.
Sound effects (alienyell, lasergun and ufo landing) by mlestn1.
All audio was provided by freesound.org
